column5: I want to take me son to the north end of pigeon lake and need to rent a boat. Any one know of a place that is still open?   JEFF  Or some one  to take us out we have all our own gear just no boat. I will pay for gas and lunch.  :rolleyes:
You could try Buckeye Marine in Bobcaygeon.
Pigeon lake resort is near noogies creek and open until nov. 15.
if P.L.R. has no boats left, you can try Trail's End Lodge too. They had boats for rent when i stayed there over thanksgiving. They are a bit further up 36 north at the end of Crowes Line Road
